name: rivergame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: river game
des:
Gives information of rivers in US country.
Also kids can play quiz where questions are based on rivers in US

To invoke this skill say-
Alexa start river game
or
Alexa ask river game

Say river name like snake, red and Alexa will tell all details of river.

Also to take an quiz you can say,
start a quiz 
quiz
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
